Token.Abstract: The CWWebserverManager class represents the local webserver run by Connichiwa in order to run local web applications. It is responsible for launching and managing the webserver and acts as a bridge between Objective-C and the server, sending and receiving messages from it over the Connichiwa Communication Protocol (Native Layer). Only one instance of the webserver should be running on a device.
The delegate to receive events by this class
The delegate to receive events by this class
The delegate to receive events by this class
Path to the folder acting as the root of the web server. '/' on the web server will be mapped to this path.
Path to the folder acting as the root of the web server. '/' on the web server will be mapped to this path.
Path to the folder acting as the root of the web server. '/' on the web server will be mapped to this path.

Initialize a new CWWebserverManager instance with the given document root (should point to the path where the web application resides). Calling this does not actually start the webserver, use startWebserver to do so.

Parameter.Name: documentRoot
Parameter.Abstract: The document root of the webserver, usually pointing to the path of the web application. '/' on the web server will be mapped to this path.

Token.Abstract: Starts the webserver on the given port, making it possible for web clients to connect to it

Parameter.Name: port
Parameter.Abstract: The port the webserver should listen on. Note that the websocket server will listen on this + 1

Token.Abstract: Sends the given identifier to the web library and tells the web library this is the identifier of this device. Should usually only be called once in the application's life cycle and only with the correct identifier, otherwise results are undefined.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: The identifier that represents this device amongst Connichiwa

Token.Abstract: Sends a message to the web library telling it about a newly detected, nearby device with the given identifier

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: The identifier of the device that was detected

Token.Abstract: Sends a message to the web library telling it that the distance of a previously detected device has changes

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: The identifier of the device whose distance changes

Parameter.Name: distance
Parameter.Abstract: The new distance of the device in meters

Token.Abstract: Sends a message to the web library telling it that a request to use another device as a remote device has failed

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: The identifier of the device that should have been used as a remote device
